citations.narrative:
Eight of the water bottles for the guinea pigs have a build-up of green and brown debris on the insides of the containers.
An accumulation of debris or algae in water bottles can expose the guinea pigs to potential health risks and deter the
animals from drinking.
The licensee must ensure that all watering receptacles are sanitized when dirty, and at least once every 2 weeks.
Correct by : 9/13/2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a family member.
n

narrative:
3.30 
   
Watering. 
Eight of the water bottles for the guinea pigs have a build-up of green and brown debris on the insides of the containers. 
An accumulation of debris or algae in water bottles can expose the guinea pigs to potential health risks and deter the 
animals from drinking. 
The licensee must ensure that all watering receptacles are sanitized when dirty, and at least once every 2 weeks. 
Correct by : 9/13/2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a family member.
